snippet.title: Half-Life: Through The City "The Awoken Remaster"
snippet.description:
The Awoken Demo was the release that had the most impact on this mod. This was the smallest and most hyped version of Through The City. After hearing a lot of criticism regarding maps visuals and gameplay, I decided to give it another chance and improve this chapter. 

And although I'm proud of the visuals, I'm still not satisfied with the gameplay. That's why I'm uploading this as a video rather than a playable demo. Since it has been discontinued, there will be no progress with this particular version and I want to develop something much better in the future…

An article going more in depth about the new update - https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-through-the-city-2018/news/reconstruction-article

0:00 - 0:25 Intro
0:25 - 1:52 Gman Intro
1:52 - 7:10 Industrial Complex
7:10 - 10:20 Trainstation
10:20 - 14:12 Apartments
14:12 - 16:33 City Streets
16:33 - 21:42 Canals
21:42 - 22:58 Corey Scene (Updated)
22:58 - 23:26 Subway Station
23:26 - 24:08 Chair Intro Scene (Updated)
